page.title: 11Chain Hill Farm, Wantage (1)
page.content: Mr.Richard Froud and his two brothers farm 1,000 acres on the Downs south of Wantage.They employ 5 men.They own 2 combine harvesters. They grow wheat for bread and biscuits, and barley for beer and animal feed. The crops are sprayed to kill the weeds which are wild oats,goose grass and couch grass.In a barn we were shown all sorts of pipes and switches and a big underground tank where the grain is stored. They also grow hay.It is taken to a barn where there is a big fan to dry it.This prevents it from overheating in haystack. They used to rear beef cattle but this is not profitable now.
